newsitem.title: SYRIA: Syria offers 16,000 tonnes of lentils for sale.
newsitem.headline: Syria offers 16,000 tonnes of lentils for sale.

text.p: Syria's General Establishment for Cereal Processing and Trade (GECPT) has offered 16,000 tonnes of lentils for export, an official spokesman said on Tuesday.
He told Reuters that an international call for prices setting April 8 as final date to receive bids had been issued. Confirmation would be made on April 9.
The spokesman said the lentils of the 1996 crop would be ready for shipment in May.
Partial offers will be acceptable up to 1,000 tonnes and the establishment has the right for partial confirmation, he said.
